author: altimario
title: 1st universal E-learning connector
description: E-learning platform vendors prevent data interoperability and learners can't certify skills across overlapping courses and platforms.
solution: A connector between learners and platforms that stores data in Cardano, where only the user owns and accesses his/her learning data.
experience:
22 years in IT industry which includes:
software consulting for large enterprise and gov, tech-Startup, AI, Open-source contribution, EdTech
